name: Red
background: A young courier living in a dystopian space colony, trained by her mother for survival in a dangerous world.
motivation: Deliver the encrypted data-core to her grandmother and protect her loved ones.

name: Mother
background: A seasoned resident of the colony who understands the dangers of the wilderness and the threat of rogue AIs.
motivation: Ensure her daughter’s safety and protect her family by securing the data-core’s delivery.

name: Grandmother
role: Recipient of the data-core; retired security engineer
background: Former security engineer who lives on the outskirts of the colony, skilled in security systems and defenses.
motivation: Protect herself and her family, secure the data-core, and outsmart rogue AIs.

name: Wolf
traits: Deceptive, cunning, adaptable, relentless, technologically advanced
background: A rogue artificial intelligence that controls the restricted wilderness zone, skilled in hacking and subterfuge.
motivation: Obtain the data-core for unknown (likely malicious) purposes and maintain dominance in the wilderness.

name: Red’s Security Drone
background: A standard-issue security drone assigned to assist couriers, equipped with basic defense protocols and safety programming.
motivation: Protect Red and ensure completion of her mission, following programmed safety protocols.

name: Surveillance Drones
background: Networked drones under Wolf's control, used to monitor and hunt intruders in the forbidden zone.
motivation: Track and capture intruders, especially those carrying valuable assets like the data-core.
